channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+1524] Petition to Apple: Fix Your iPhone 4 Problems With Free Case
item.description: Apple acknowledges the iPhone 4's reception problems. Their solution: Hold it differently or buy a case. But if this is an Apple design problem, they should fix it for real or give out cases for free.

item.title: [+1244] Steve Carell Leaving 'The Office': CONFIRMED
item.description: Steve Carell is leaving 'The Office' next May, E! confirms. Carell told BBC in April that his contract expires at the end of this season and he did not plan to renew it. Now he has made it clear he wasn't just holding out for a better salary.

item.title: [+1056] Nobody Is Home - Lets Watch Porn (COMIC)
[+894] 10 Neat Facts About Tron
item.description: Twenty eight years after the release of Tron, Hollywood is coming out with a sequel that will surely be packed to the gills with special effects. But can the new Tron Legacy movie beat the groundbreaking original? Do you remember the old one? (Heck, were you born yet?)

item.title: [+852] Science Historian Cracks the 'Plato Code'
item.description: (PhysOrg.com) -- A science historian at The University of Manchester has cracked 'The Plato Code' - the long disputed secret messages hidden in the great philosopher's writings.

item.title: [+788] Thanks To BP, This Is A Whale [pic]
item.description: A sperm whale found 70 miles from the Gulf Coast oil spill. Beware, the truth is graphic.

item.title: [+766] Walmart baby selling Dad brutally beaten in CA prison
item.description: The demented dad, arrested for allegedly trying to hawk his 8-month-old in a Walmart parking lot, has been butally beaten in a California jail after his cellmates heard of his heinous crime. The dad was briefly hospitalized and treated for two cracked ribs and injuries to his face.

item.title: [+725] Iceland PM Weds Partner After Gay Marriage is Legalized
item.description: Iceland's prime minister,Johanna Sigurdardottir, has married her partner under a new law legalizing same-sex marriage in the country. The two got married the same day the law came into force.

item.title: [+684] A bit fucking late now!
item.description: Fifa president Sepp Blatter apologises to the Football Association over Frank Lampard's disallowed goal in England's World Cup defeat by Germany.

item.title: [+601] Tooth Regeneration Gel Could Replace Painful Fillings
item.description: Dentists could soon hang up their drills. A new peptide, embedded in a soft gel or a thin, flexible film and placed next to a cavity, encourages cells inside teeth to regenerate in about a month, according to a new study in the journal ACS Nano. This technology is the first of its kind.

item.title: [+578] A Note From Your Bartender [PIC]
item.description: File under Dive Bars. A misspelling aside, this bartender has a salient message behind his point -- personal responsibility is key.

item.title: [+557] Hulu Plus is Real: $10/Month for iPhone, iPad and TV Viewing
item.description: Finally! Hulu Plus has been made official, and it looks awesome.

item.title: [+542] Pep Boys takes man on long, strange ride
item.description: It started with a check engine light and a knocking sound in early May. It has now been more than 50 days. The result? The car has been in the store for 16 nights. Mohan has had no less than 11 visits to the store. He's had to take 2 full days off work to deal with the problem and made more than 30 phone calls. He's spent almost $800, and the car s

item.title: [+528] Windows 8 lead: an App Store for Windows, IE9 beta in August
item.description: Slides describing Microsoft's plans and ambitions for the Windows 8 hardware and software ecosystem have been leaked. In the documents, the company outlines its plans for performance improvements and a Windows Store for third-party software sales.

item.title: [+497] Obama's Pro-Gun Presidency
item.description: The Supreme Courtâ€™s Second Amendment ruling is yet another reminder: Obama is not, in fact, coming for your guns. Busting the rightâ€™s latest fear-mongering myth.

item.title: [+475] Grandpa Gaga - Poker Face Dance
item.description: Grandpa busts some moves to Lady Gaga's Poker Face. Video quality is a bit poor, but some great moves!
